definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: shaking, pole, bar of yoke;—abs. ´[[מ]] Nu 4:10 + 5 t.; sf. [[מׂטֵ֫הוּ]] Na 1:13; —
a shaking; tottering (c. neg., of security) [[לַצַּדִּיק לאׁ־יִתֵּן]] ´[[מ]] Ps 55:23; [[רַגְלֵנוּ]] ´[[לאׁ נׇתַן לַמ]] Ps 66:9, cf. Ps 121:3.
pole, or bar for carrying (named from springing motion) Nu 4:10, Nu 4:12 cf. esp. Nu 13:23.
bar of yoke Na 1:13 ([[אֶשְׁבּׂר מׂטֵהוּ מֵעָלַיַךְ]]), fig. of oppression. Cf. following.
